scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:wct
scripts.test-parallel: npm run test:unit:parallel && npm run test:wct
scripts.test:wct: npm run build:all && npx nx wct map
scripts.test:wctdetail: npm run build:all  && npx nx wctdetail map
scripts.storybook:ci-test: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-1: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/components/[a-m]*/**/*'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-2: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/components/[n-z]*/**/*'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-3: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/elements/[a-i]*/**/*'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-4: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/elements/[j-z]*/**/*'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-5: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/sections/**/*'
scripts.storybook:ci-test-parallel-6: start-server-and-test 'npx nx storybook storybook' http://localhost:8080 'npx nx e2e storybook-e2e -- --spec **/src/e2e/map/**/*'
scripts.killstart:storybook: npx kill-port 8080 && npx nx storybook storybook
scripts.killstart:playground: npx kill-port 4200 && npx nx serve playground
scripts.process:scss: npx nx process-scss elements && npx nx process-scss components && npx nx process-scss map && npx nx process-scss sections && node post-process-libs.mjs
scripts.build:all: npm run build:common-utilities && npm run build:elements && npm run build:components && npm run build:map && npm run build:sections && npm run build:test-support && npm run process:scss
scripts.release:all: npm run release:common-utilities && npm run release:elements && npm run release:components && npm run release:map && npm run release:sections && npm run release:test-support
